description: This file defines multiple service interfaces related to social media management platform, including authentication, social account management, scheduling, analytics, and automation rules.

classes.name: IAuthService
classes.description: Interface for authentication-related operations such as user registration, login, and retrieving user data.

classes.name: ISocialAccountService
classes.description: Interface for managing social accounts, including connecting, listing, and disconnecting accounts.

classes.name: ISchedulingService
classes.description: Interface for scheduling posts, listing scheduled posts, canceling, and listing published posts.

classes.name: IAnalyticsService
classes.description: Interface for accessing analytical summaries and time series data related to user metrics.

classes.name: IAutomationRuleService
classes.description: Interface for creating, listing, updating, deleting, and toggling automation rules.

methods.name: RegisterAsync
methods.description: Registers a new user and returns an authentication response with JWT token.

methods.name: LoginAsync
methods.description: Logs in an existing user and returns JWT token.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a user by their unique identifier.

methods.name: ConnectAsync
methods.description: Connects a social account to a user account.

methods.name: ListAsync (SocialAccountService)
methods.description: Lists social accounts associated with a user.

methods.name: DisconnectAsync
methods.description: Disconnects a social account from a user.

methods.name: ScheduleAsync
methods.description: Schedules a new social media post.

methods.name: ListScheduledAsync
methods.description: Lists scheduled posts, optionally filtered by social account.

methods.name: ListPublishedAsync
methods.description: Lists posts that have been published, optionally filtered by social account.

methods.name: GetSummaryAsync
methods.description: Retrieves analytical summary data for a user.

methods.name: GetTimeSeriesAsync
methods.description: Retrieves time series data for specified metrics.

methods.name: CreateAsync
methods.description: Creates a new automation rule for a user.

methods.name: ListAsync (AutomationRuleService)
methods.description: Lists automation rules for a user.

methods.name: ToggleAsync
methods.description: Enables or disables an automation rule.
